snippet.title: Balsa Model Flight Simulator Beta Playtest Announcement trailer - Future Games Show GamesCom 2021
snippet.description: The creator of Kerbal Space Program is back with a new project: Balsa Model Flight Simulator. Players will be able to build, fly and fight custom model aircraft in this in-depth digital workshop. If you want to go hands-on, the Open Beta Playtest is available now on Steam.
